statements: SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM equipment_maintenance
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 1
SELECT maintenance_description, equipment_name, equipment_id FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-02-15'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM equipment_maintenance
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 1
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%pump%' ORDER BY equipment_id
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_name IN ('Pump A', 'Pump B') AND maintenance_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(maintenance_date) AS maintenance_count FROM equipment_maintenance GROUP BY equipment_name HAVING COUNT(maintenance_date) > 1 ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM facility_maintenance;
SELECT maintenance_date, notes FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE technician_id = 1;
SELECT technician_id, maintenance_type FROM facility_maintenance WHERE facility_id = 10;
SELECT facility_id, maintenance_date, technician_id FROM facility_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Plumbing';
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, technician_id FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Emergency Repair' AND technician_id = 123 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC
SELECT facility_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM facility_maintenance WHERE technician_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, notes FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 1001 AND maintenance_type LIKE '%Repair%'
SELECT facility_id, maintenance_type, technician_id, notes FROM facility_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY facility_id
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT name, model, serial_number FROM equipment WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM facilities ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM facilities WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT facility_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_history WHERE equipment_id = 3 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM facilities WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT name, location FROM facilities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, model, serial_number FROM equipment WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT facilities.name, maintenance_history.maintenance_type FROM facilities JOIN maintenance_history ON facilities.id = maintenance_history.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment
SELECT equipment_name FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 3
SELECT facility_name, last_maintenance_date FROM facilities WHERE facility_id = 5
SELECT maintenance_task FROM maintenance_history WHERE equipment_id = 2 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT facility_name, maintenance_task FROM facilities, facility_history WHERE facilities.facility_id = facility_history.facility_id
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%machine%';
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM maintenance_history GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT e.*, mh.maintenance_task FROM equipment e JOIN maintenance_history mh ON e.equipment_id = mh.equipment_id WHERE mh.maintenance_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type, location FROM facility;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT maintenance_description, technician_name FROM maintenance_record WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT facility_name, location, facility_type FROM facility ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facility WHERE facility_type = 'Hospital'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_record WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(record_id) AS total_maintenance_records FROM facility JOIN maintenance_record ON facility.facility_id = maintenance_record.facility_id GROUP BY facility_name
SELECT facility_id, AVG(maintenance_cost) AS average_maintenance_cost FROM maintenance_history GROUP BY facility_id HAVING AVG(maintenance_cost) > 500
